item.title: 贡渥集团将在牛市结束后向亚洲运输北海原油
item.description: 贡渥集团将把一艘满载北海四十年代原油的超级油轮运往亚洲，此前该贸易公司在长达一个月的牛市行情中积累了大量基准石油。【原文：Gunvor Group will send a supertanker loaded with North Sea Forties crude to Asia after the trading house amassed a large volume of benchmark oil in a month-long bull play.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备在债券纳入后一周创历史新高
item.description: 在印度主权债务被纳入摩根大通新兴市场指数一周后，印度的外汇储备创下历史新高。【原文：India’s foreign exchange reserves touched an all-time high a week after the country’s sovereign debt was included in a key JPMorgan Chase & Co. emerging market index.】

item.title: 米莱伊回调休克疗法，控制阿根廷通货膨胀
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统正在为他的休克疗法计划踩刹车，以期在阿根廷暗淡的经济现实中稳住民众的支持，即使这意味着令市场不安。【原文：President Javier Milei is tapping the brakes on his shock therapy program in a bid to hold on to popular support amid Argentina’s bleak economic reality, even if it means unsettling markets.】

item.title: 德国计划向 KNDS 订购 100 多门轮式榴弹炮
item.description: 德国正计划从法德防务承包商 KNDS 订购 100 多门拳击手自行榴弹炮，这是执政联盟大规模军事扩张的最新一笔大宗采购。【原文：Germany is planning to order more than 100 Boxer self-propelled howitzers from Franco-German defense contractor KNDS, the latest big-ticket purchase as part of a major military expansion by the ruling coalition.】

item.title: 芬兰通过驱逐法在俄罗斯边境拦截移民
item.description: 芬兰议会投票赞成一项法律，允许北欧国家击退俄罗斯派往其边境的移民，这是莫斯科混合战争的一部分。【原文：Finland’s parliament voted in favor of a law that allows the Nordic country to push back migrants that Russia sends to its border as part of Moscow’s hybrid warfare.】

item.title: 印度 6 月通胀加速，暂停加息正当合理
item.description: 印度的通胀率在 6 月份加速上升，为央行决定在更长时间内维持较高利率提供了理由。【原文：India’s inflation accelerated in June, justifying the central bank’s decision to keep interest rates higher for longer.】

item.title: 得益于尼曼-萨克斯的交易，巴尼斯计划卷土重来
item.description: 巴尼斯纽约百货公司（Barneys New York）长期以来深受纽约富人的喜爱，直到 2019 年才因破产关闭了麦迪逊大道旗舰店和其他美国分店。【原文：Barneys New York, the department store long beloved by rich New Yorkers before a 2019 bankruptcy shuttered its Madison Avenue flagship and other US outlets, is gearing up for a revival of sorts at outposts in Manhattan and beyond.】

item.title: KKR 和 Palm Capital 从 Catena 手中收购丹麦物流地产
item.description: KKR & Co.和 Palm Capital Ltd.成为投资公司收购北欧房地产资产的最新例证，该行业去年因借贷成本大幅飙升而陷入困境。【原文：KKR & Co. and Palm Capital Ltd. have become the latest example of investment firms picking up Nordic real estate assets in an industry that was crippled by a sharp jump in borrowing costs last year.】

item.title: Cucinelli 股价下滑预示奢侈品行业将迎来艰难的业绩季
item.description: 市场对 Brunello Cucinelli SpA 公司第二季度稳健盈利的消极反应是欧洲奢侈品公司的一个不祥之兆。【原文：Markets’ downbeat reaction to Brunello Cucinelli SpA’s solid second-quarter earnings is an ominous sign for Europe’s luxury goods companies, which likely face a tough slog this results season to placate investors’ concerns for the sector.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行寻求返还用于提高储备金的资金
item.description: 土耳其央行正在努力归还外国同行的存款，同时减少在硬通货缓冲压力下积累的负债。【原文：The Turkish central bank is working to return deposits placed by foreign counterparts as it brings down the liabilities accumulated when its hard currency buffers were under pressure.】

item.title: 联合利华将在 2025 年前裁减三分之一的欧洲办公室职位
item.description: 联合利华集团（Unilever Plc）将在欧洲裁减三分之一的办公室员工，该消费品集团正推进在全球范围内裁减 7500 个工作岗位的计划。【原文：Unilever Plc is cutting a third of its office staff in Europe, as the consumer goods group pushes ahead with plans to slash 7,500 jobs worldwide.】

item.title: 习近平的粮食安全新举措从中国的田间地头开始
item.description:
这个幅员辽阔的国家拥有全球五分之一的人口，但耕地面积却不到全球的十分之一。北京希望调整这种不平衡。【原文：

The vast nation has a fifth of the global population but less than a 10th of the world’s arable land. Beijing wants to adjust the imbalance.

】

item.title: 汇丰银行撤回交易员对卡塔尔经济的负面研究报告
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，汇丰控股公司今年早些时候收回了一份对卡塔尔经济作出悲观评估的备忘录，并在几天后发出了对卡塔尔经济前景更为乐观的研究报告。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc retracted a memo offering a downbeat assessment of Qatar’s economy earlier this year and sent out research that offered a more positive outlook days later, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 汉莎航空因票价疲软削减盈利目标；启动节约计划
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）下调了全年利润预期，并警告说，由于要应对更高的单位成本和机票价格下跌，其同名德国航空公司实现收支平衡将 "越来越具有挑战性"。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG cut its profit outlook for the full year and warned that breaking even at its namesake German carrier will be “increasingly challenging” as it grapples with higher unit costs and falling ticket prices.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。大家都在关注美国银行业的收益，国债又开始流行起来，而日本则在货币方面掀起了波澜。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. All eyes are on US bank earnings, Treasuries are back in vogue and Japan makes waves in currencies. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 问与答：土耳其央行行长谈指导与通货膨胀
item.description: 土耳其中央银行行长法提赫-卡拉汉（Fatih Karahan）周四在伊斯坦布尔接受了彭博社的采访，谈到了货币当局的前瞻性指导、通胀前景、储备金、里拉流动性和互换法规。为清晰起见，问答内容略有删减。【原文：Turkey’s Central Bank Governor Fatih Karahan sat down for an interview with Bloomberg in Istanbul on Thursday and talked about the monetary authority’s forward guidance, inflation outlook, reserves, lira liquidity and swap regulations. The questions and answers have been lightly edited for clarity.】

item.title: 土耳其央行行长希望摒弃提前降息的说法
item.description: 土耳其央行行长向担心过早宽松的外国投资者发出了他迄今为止最强硬的信息，称他希望在讨论降息之前确保今年以后能够实现通胀目标。【原文：Turkey’s central bank governor delivered his most emphatic message yet to foreign investors worried about premature easing, saying he wants to ensure he can meet inflation goals beyond this year before discussing interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 赞比亚推动非美元化是对亲商领导人的关键考验
item.description: 赞比亚拟议的法规可能会对在本地交易中使用外币的行为处以 10 年监禁，这引起了当地企业的质疑和批评，这可能是对哈坎德-希奇莱马总统的亲投资政府的一次重要考验。【原文：Zambia’s proposed regulations that could impose 10-year jail terms for using foreign currency in local transactions have raised questions and criticism from local businesses, in what could be a crucial test of President Hakainde Hichilema’s pro-investment government.】

item.title: 英镑升值 50 亿美元，乐观情绪升温
item.description: 英镑目前处于一年来最强劲的水平，巩固了其在十国集团中的领先地位，从高盛集团到 Pictet 的策略师都预测英镑将继续上涨。【原文：The pound is trading at its strongest level in a year, cementing its position at the top of the G-10 pack with strategists from Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to Pictet predicting more gains to come.】

item.title: 科拉诺维奇离职引发 1999 年华尔街回响
item.description: 华尔街已经有大约 25 年没有认真猎熊了。现在看来，另一场狩猎又要开始了。【原文：It’s been about 25 years since Wall Street had a serious bear hunt. And it appears another one is starting up now.】

item.title: 英国支持的肯尼亚机构为非洲企业寻求 13 亿美元资金
item.description: 总部位于肯尼亚的英国发展机构 FSD Africa 正在帮助两个基金筹集 13 亿美元，投资于非洲七个国家的企业。【原文：FSD Africa, a UK development agency headquartered in Kenya, is helping raise $1.3 billion for two funds investing in businesses across seven African countries.】

item.title: 对冲基金巨头在强劲开局中有望迎来最好的一年
item.description: 在股票和量化投资的帮助下，最大的对冲基金取得了一年中最好的开局之一，而那些专注于宏观交易的对冲基金则落后于同行。【原文：The biggest hedge funds are off to one of their best starts to a year, aided by stocks and quantitative investing, while those focused on macro trading are lagging behind their peers.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司因其对有害内容的欺骗性 "蓝色检查 "保证而遭到欧盟抨击
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 因欺骗用户参与可能有害的内容而受到欧盟的警告，这是布鲁塞尔针对大科技公司的做法所采取的最新行动。【原文：Elon Musk’s social media platform X has been hit with a warning from the European Union for deceiving users into engaging with potentially harmful content, in the latest show of force by Brussels against Big Tech’s practices.】

item.title: 炎炎夏日，沙特阿拉伯加大最脏石油的采购力度
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将最脏的石油进口量提高到三年多来的最高水平，以帮助满足炎热夏季的电力需求。【原文：Saudi Arabia boosted imports of the dirtiest type of oil to the highest in more than three years to help meet power demand during the scorching summer.】

item.title: 大选波动减弱，法国扩大债券拍卖规模
item.description: 法国增加了下周计划出售的债务数额，这表明人们相信本月大选带来的不确定性正在消散。【原文：France increased the amount of debt it plans to sell next week, in a sign of confidence that uncertainty unleashed by elections this month is dissipating.】

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特效应可能成为英国央行利率制定者的最新难题
item.description: 英格兰银行的利率制定者们在寻找服务业通胀已经降温到足以打开降息大门的迹象时，可能会遇到一个新的难题：如何应对泰勒-斯威夫特效应。【原文：Bank of England rate-setters may have a new conundrum as they look for signs that services inflation has cooled by enough to open the door to interest rate cuts: how to deal with the Taylor Swift effect.】

item.title: 英国斯坦洛炼油厂将建造欧洲首座氢能发电厂
item.description: Essar Energy Transition 是英格兰西北部斯坦洛炼油厂的运营商，计划在该厂建设欧洲首座氢能发电厂。【原文：Essar Energy Transition, operator of the Stanlow oil refinery in northwest England, plans to build Europe’s first hydrogen-ready power plant at the site.】

item.title: 外国人以多年未见的速度购买南非债券
item.description: 由于美联储越来越接近降息，南非政府债券的收益率在新兴市场中名列前茅，外国投资者周四买入了两年多来最多的南非政府债券。【原文：Foreign investors bought the most South African government bonds in more than two years on Thursday, attracted by yields among the highest in emerging markets as the Federal Reserve gets closer to cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 据天空电视台报道，力拓正在研究对泰克的潜在竞购提案
item.description: 天空新闻》援引未透露身份的消息来源报道称，力拓集团正在研究对包括泰克资源有限公司在内的公司的潜在竞购方案。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is studying proposals for potential bids for companies including Teck Resources Ltd., Sky News reported citing sources it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 日本央行账目显示日本在美国消费者物价指数公布后采取干预措施提振日元
item.description: 根据彭博社对各国央行账户的分析，在周四美国通胀数据公布后不久，日本很可能在今年第三次进入货币市场支撑日元。【原文：Japan likely stepped into currency markets for a third time this year to prop up the yen soon after US inflation data came out Thursday, according to a Bloomberg analysis of central bank accounts.】
